metadata.title: Senate body recommends Housing Ministry to hand over house to widow

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 06 (APP):The Senate Sub-Committee on Housing and Works on Monday recommended the Ministry of Housing to hand over the house to the widow. The committee meeting under the chairmanship of Convener Committee Senator Raja Nasir Abbas. The issue of alleged illegal occupation of an official residence by a widow was considered in the meeting of the committee. The petition filed by the widow regarding illegal hand over of her official residence to another citizen was considered. The sub-committee also heard the position of the ministry and carefully reviewed the entire issue. Apart from Senator Aslam Abro, the Joint Secretary of the Ministry of Housing and Works also attended the meeting of the said committee.
content.summary: A Senate Sub-Committee on Housing and Works recommended the Ministry of Housing hand over a house to a widow. The committee considered a petition filed by the widow regarding the alleged illegal handover of her official residence. The meeting was chaired by Senator Raja Nasir Abbas and included the Joint Secretary of the Ministry of Housing and Works.
